LanguageData.RE_BioticRecoveryOffset.degreeDatas.0.de: [PAWN_nameDef]’s biotic capabilities are significantly dampened by past trauma, or simply the lack of predisposition.
LanguageData.RE_BioticRecoveryOffset.degreeDatas.1.de: [PAWN_nameDef] has not yet unlocked their full biotic potential, and most likely never will.
LanguageData.RE_BioticRecoveryOffset.degreeDatas.2.de: [PAWN_nameDef]’s biotic skills are greatly above average, allowing them to use the power without any fear of migraines or discomfort.
LanguageData.RE_BioticRecoveryOffset.degreeDatas.3.de: [PAWN_nameDef]’s biotic skills are known far and wide across the galaxy due to their talent and rare predisposition.
